item.title: How to open the triple-locked safebox in WoW Midnight
item.content:encoded: Get some loot and progress the Treasures of Eversong achievement.

item.title: Wooting 60HE v2 review
item.content:encoded: Its best yet.

item.title: Balatro meets Scrabble in this new roguelike from the creators of TimeSplitters—and I'm just thrilled to finally find a word game that lets me score with swear words
item.content:encoded: Beyond Words finds the perfect balance between synergy and spelling.

item.title: A new California law says all operating systems, including Linux, need to have some form of age verification at account setup
item.content:encoded: I wonder how the government of California plans to enforce it?

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem's path tracing is tough on GPUs but it probably won't take as long as ray tracing did to become a mainstream option in games
item.content:encoded: Ray tracing? Pffft, easy peasy now.

item.title: Intel Foundry exec leaves to head up Qualcomm's semiconductor biz as Intel shake-up continues
item.content:encoded: Intel has lost a few key execs over the past 18 months.

item.title: 'An absolute eyesore': Marathon's biggest issue seems to be its poor UI design that's confusing players, 'I have no idea where I'm at, what I'm looking at'
item.content:encoded: And now the kids are calling it fontslop.

item.title: Sony looks to be 'backing away from putting their exclusive console stuff on PC,' says Bloomberg's Jason Schreier
item.content:encoded: Time to hoard your Nixxes ports like nuts for winter.

item.title: Anthropic is standing up to the US Department of War and refusing to remove AI autonomous weapon and mass surveillance safeguards: 'We cannot in good conscience accede to their request'
item.content:encoded: 'We will not knowingly provide a product that puts America’s warfighters and civilians at risk.'

item.title: Nvidia releases then unreleases GeForce 595.59 drivers as reports of graphics card fan outages and clock speed issues pour in
item.content:encoded: Here's hoping it's fixed before the Marathon Server Slam ends.

item.title: 'The Light really did call EVERYBODY': players find Leeory Jenkins, complete with his cloth shoulderpads, defending the Sunwell in World of Warcraft: Midnight
item.content:encoded: Those shoulders'll help him heal better, he'll have more mana.

item.title: The massive difference between how well Resident Evil Requiem runs on the Steam Deck and an Asus ROG Ally just adds more fuel to the rumour that AMD has abandoned driver support for its Ryzen Z1 chips
item.content:encoded: And if that really is the case, how long before it does the same with Z2 processors?

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem pulls in 270,000 players in just 2 hours on Steam, beating Village, Biohazard and the Resident Evil 4 remake
item.content:encoded: That's the pull of Leon S Kennedy.

item.title: Capcom's RE Engine is the gift that keeps on giving: Resident Evil Requiem runs surprisingly well on the Steam Deck
item.content:encoded: I didn't expect a big budget 2026 game to be this playable on the Deck.

item.title: Fallout 76 adjusted roughly 50 events and activities for the latest free update, with more XP for higher levels and shorter timers: 'We tried to concentrate on the broad strokes'
item.content:encoded: Events and activities have had a facelift.

item.title: Famed for its 100+ hour anime tactics RPGs, the Disgaea series is getting an action-centric spin-off
item.content:encoded: Kyouran Makaism released in Japan last month, but will come to the west as Disgaea Mayhem.

item.title: Valve's former economist, now a member of parliament in Greece, is being put on trial for promoting drug use because he admitted to taking ecstasy 36 years ago
item.content:encoded: He's come a long way from analyzing TF2 hat sales data.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem guide: Puzzle solutions, locked doors, collectibles, and more
item.content:encoded: All the RE Requiem help you need in one place.

item.title: An AI-generated review of Resident Evil Requiem written by a fake 'iGaming and sports betting analyst' briefly hit Metacritic
item.content:encoded: The site responsible laid off its real editorial staff only weeks ago.

item.title: If you're hoping to make friends in Marathon like you can in Arc Raiders, expect a knife in the back
item.content:encoded: In my experience, shoot first.

item.title: The next Lego Batman recreates a memorable scene from the 1989 movie, complete with Prince soundtrack
item.content:encoded: It's a party, man.

item.title: Netflix isn't going to buy Warner Bros after all, meaning Paramount is set to take HBO, Warner Bros Games, and the rest
item.content:encoded: The acquisition was "always a 'nice to have' at the right price, not a 'must have' at any price," Netflix said.

item.title: All the Stardew Valley 10th anniversary announcements, including new romance options and a giant Pelican Town desk mat to replace your map keybinds
item.content:encoded: It's shaping up to be a year-long celebration.

item.title: How to get all security clearance levels in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Open Security Points across Rhodes Hill.

item.title: How to find the helicopter key in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Solve the VIP Suite puzzle to try and escape the Care Center.

item.title: All Resident Evil Requiem safe codes
item.content:encoded: Open all of the safes to get some extra loot.

item.title: How to solve the scavenger hunt in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: You kids have fun solving this one.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem briefcase code
item.content:encoded: Find the correct case combination for a reward.

item.title: All Resident Evil Requiem lockpick locations and how to open simple locks
item.content:encoded: Grab some picks to crack any simple lock you find.

item.title: Where to find Victor's office in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: A little lost playing as Leon in the Care Center?

item.title: How to solve each puzzle box in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Open the Sun, Moon, and Star Quartz door so you can leave the Care Center.

item.title: Take out this early enemy in Resident Evil Requiem to give Grace a much-needed damage boost
item.content:encoded: She's going to need all the help she can get.

item.title: How to open the Organ Transport Box in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Crack open this container you find in the garage.

item.title: How to open warped doors in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: The door is warped and won't open.

item.title: All Antique Coin locations in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Buy some early upgrades with this precious currency.

item.title: How to kill the Chunk in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Slay this chubby East Wing monster as Grace.

item.title: How to open Cold Storage in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Find a way to unseal the door without a handwheel.

item.title: How to use the Severed Hand in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Here's what the mysterious appendage actually does.

item.title: How to open the unicorn door in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Plus solve the Unicorn Trinket Box so you can enter the Parlor.

item.title: All Resident Evil Requiem charm locations
item.content:encoded: Collect these trinkets to buff both Leon and Grace.

item.title: How to expand Grace's inventory in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Track down a Hip Pouch so you can carry more stuff.

item.title: All Mr. Raccoon locations in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Break all 25 Raccoon statues to unlock extra weapon upgrades.

item.title: How to escape The Girl in Resident Evil Requiem
item.content:encoded: Lisa Trevor could never.

item.title: 3 months after laying off a bunch of people, Splash Damage has become 'Splash Damage Group' and acquired another studio
item.content:encoded: The world of business will never not mystify me.

item.title: You might think hidden object games aren't cool, but that's only because you haven't tried the Find My Frogs: Branches demo yet
item.content:encoded: Frog buttcrack: If those two words don't convince you to at least try the Steam Next Fest demo for Find My Frogs: Branches, then I don't even know what I'm doing here.

item.title: Path of Exile's next expansion overhauls a beloved endgame system that hasn't seen major changes for 10 years
item.content:encoded: Path of Exile 2's ideas are already starting to seep back into the original game.

item.title: If your mouse input is totally busted in Marathon right now, I may have the fix
item.content:encoded: Bungie is working on a real fix, but for now, try this.

item.title: The New York Attorney General's Office has flipped at least one Counter-Strike knife skin on the Steam Marketplace for purposes of state
item.content:encoded: The funds went to a good cause: Buying a Steam Deck. Also for state purposes.

item.title: Just Cause dev co-founder says the studio got too big and 'numbers focused,' so he quit and made a $25 open world crime brawler
item.content:encoded: "We're not here to create funky business models, we're here to create great games," says Christofer Sundberg of his new studio and game, Samson.

item.title: Marathon briefly censors 'Arc Raiders' in chat, just like Activision and EA did, and it was probably another accident because it was quickly and quietly fixed
item.content:encoded: Bungie still hasn't acknowledged that it happened, though, which is a little strange.
